title: Lag and Disconnect Issue - 03/02/2015 20:30 - 21:15
body:
Summoners,

Last night at approximately 20:30 we saw the start of a wide spread Oceania issue where players were disconnecting constantly or lagging. This incident took approximately 30-40 minutes to return back to normal service. After some initial investigation we discovered that one of our ISP's had and Edge Device (router or switch) fail due to a software problem.

During this incident window Loss Forgiven was enable to assist players from receiving unfair losses due to the outage.

If you are still having connection issues please head over to our [Network Diagnostic Tool](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/tools/network-logs) and complete the steps described so we can analyze and investigate for you.

We are sorry for the inconvenience this has caused.

-ToxicHawk
